item.title: Washington Post cartoonist quits after drawing of Bezos, other billionaires with Trump rejected
item.description: A rough sketch of the cartoon shows several men resembling corporate billionaires kneeling before a man wearing a suit and a long tie, representing Tr...

item.title: Investors head into next week with a cloudy January outlook and a looming jobs report
item.description: Wall Street is carefully watching to see how January shapes up, as it is the month that historically sets the tone for the rest of the year.

item.title: New Orleans attacker used very rare explosive in bombs, officials say
item.description: The explosive has never before been used in a U.S. or European terrorist attack.

item.title: New Orleans attacker said in videos to his family that he considered killing them before joining ISIS
item.description: Experts said the details that have emerged about Shamsud-Din Jabbar, 42, align with the typical pattern of how a veteran can be radicalized to violenc...

item.title: Amit Yoran, chair and CEO of cybersecurity firm Tenable, dies unexpectedly after cancer battle
item.description: Yoran led the cybersecurity company in its IPO in 2018.
